original_text: And when all the kings who were servants of Hadadezer saw that they had been defeated by Israel, they made peace with Israel and became subject to them. So the Syrians were afraid to save the Ammonites anymore.
korean_text: 하닷에셀에게 속한 왕들이 자기가 이스라엘 앞에서 패함을 보고 이스라엘과 화친하고 섬기니 그러므로 아람 사람들이 두려워하여 다시는 암몬 자손을 돕지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: all the kings who were servants of Hadadezer
saw that they had been defeated by Israel
So the Syrians were afraid to save the Ammonites anymore.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 수리아 사람들은 더 이상 암몬 사람들을 구원하기를 두려워하였다
